name: In Darkness
description: In Darkness is a game that combines the essence of several genres like: role playing; hack n' slash; dungeon crawler; rogue like; and many others. It brings a challenging experience not only based on real time fighting, but also on how to search for information, and navigate labyrinths without map systems.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual-Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
